name: HolidayPlanner
0:
”Alexa ask Holiday Planner for next long weekend”
”when is the next long weekend?”
”when is the next holiday?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: holiday planner
des: Use this skill for finding the next holiday. Alexa will give you a fun and useful response whenever you ask!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
